boardgame.name: The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron: The Battles for Arnhem and Nijmegen
boardgame.description: Devil's Cauldron is a company level simulation of the Northern two drop zones in Operation Market Garden. It is loosely based on an old Victory Games game called Panzer Command._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Command and control is emphasized in this system and the game includes extensive documentation and historical background._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components include 4 linking maps (for the grand campaign) and three smaller gamettes (on Arnhem, the Island and Groesbeek Heights - each with its own rules and map). 1600 counters (of which roughly 700 are actual combat units) and attendant documentation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Play time for the various games range from one hour all the way up to 50 or so for the grand campaign._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;4 23.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x35.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; map-sheets 3 of which are back-printed w/scenario maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;3 9_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x12_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; map extensions (adding useful areas which were _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;just off_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the area covered by the 4 map-sheets)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;11 sheets of 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; die-cut full-color counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;1 counter-sheet of 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; die-cut full-color counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;Series Rulebooks (1 detailed; 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;quick start_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;TDC exclusive rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;Historical booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;8 full-color divisional displays_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;2 CRT/TEC Charts and Tables_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;1 Game Turn Chart_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;4 10-sided dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is out of shrink, but everything is unpunched and unplayed. Shipping will be 15 to the US.
Deal good for Brett Molitor only. Price includes postage.
Opened, but unpunched and unplayed copy. Buyer to pay priority mail with delivery confirmation shipping. Buy one other game from me and get a 10% discount off all games purchased.
Opened but unpunched and unplayed. Everything_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in excellent condition. FedEx Ground shipping will be $14.50. Message me for an international shipping quote.

Brand New and still in Shrink! Rare and OOP!!! Stored w/care in a smoke free home. Check out my other listings and save on combined shipping! Int_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;l buyers, please contact me before purchasing for shipping quote. *** Item price reflects a built-in 3.9% cash discount. The discount will remain in place for ANY payment methods not involving paypal credit/debit card payments. *** Paypal balance/bank acct. transfer payments preferred. *** Personal Checks must clear before game ships.
Out of shrink, but unpunched and never played.

Unpunched/unplayed. Out of shrink to verify the counters were cut properly. Some copies of this game came with miscut counter sheet--this one_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s countersheets are all correctly cut. I only accept US Postal Money Orders
Punched. Played once.

All counter sheets are UNPUNCHED and just like new. All other components are in excellent condition with no marks or creases. The box top has an as shipped from MMP small crease - both of my copies came with this same crease.

Mostly unpunched. Played the first couple of scenarios. Counters that were punched have been bagged. Looks very nice. US buyer to pay for US Priority Mail shipping with delivery confirmation unless they specifically request parcel post. This will NOT fit in a flat rate box. International bidders please contact me to discuss shipping before bidding. I will not complete a below markets customs form.
Punched and clipped, but never played. In great condition. Includes 6 GMT counter trays. Price includes shipping.
Mint and unpunched and complete. Includes Ops#1 counters.

I have one copy of MMP_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron, in unpunched, near-mint condition with the replacement counters from Operations Special Issue #1. Looking for $300 for this one plus the actual cost of shipping to your location. The usual administrivia: I‚Äôll ship anywhere you‚Äôre willing to pay the freight to, in or out of the U.S. If shipped outside the U.S., I will not declare the purchase as a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;gift_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. I prefer money orders or checks, but can also handle PayPal (PayPal is better for international deals from my experience). From a smoke-free house. Shoot me a message if you have any questions. Thanks, Ken
In shrink, perfect condition.

Game opened once and glanced at. Otherwise, new in (opened on 3 sides and left in place) shrink. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested, please contact me so I can give you the exact shipping costs. I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t take a cent on them.
Mint in shrink.

Counters punched and clipped nicely, stored in Plano boxes with labels. All contents complete. Played the starter scenario a few times. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include the 15 replacement counters from Ops #1. Will ship to Europe but be prepared for the freight.
Brand new in the factory shrink wrap. Will be shipped from zip code 11365 in the USA. Email for shipping quote.
Will also ship to the UK.

The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron I have a copy of The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron by MMP that I am looking to sell. It is punched, clipped (nicely done) and complete. All counters are stored in 2 Plano containers. $200 includes shipping in the US. International will get credit towards shipping. Get it now before Where Eagles Dare comes out. PayPal preferred, e-mail for more info.

Shrink-wrap removed only to inspect contents, found out that rules book is damaged due to shipping. Have replace rules with a new copy (from MMP). Thus it is all pristine. Everything is in mint, unpunched, unplayed condition. Will include replacement counters from OPERATIONS Special Issue No. 1, Summer 2008 (15 unpunched replacement counters). Buyers pay actual shipping cost, plus a couple of nickles and dimes for gas (I just round the shipping up to the next higher dollar etc). Contact me if you have any questions.
Unpunched Shipping Italy 9,50 eu Other TBD

Super-nice copy. Played once. Some counters punched and either sorted/bagged or put in GMT counter trays (includes 4 trays). Many counters are unpunched. *** INCLUDES REPLACEMENT COUNTERS from Operations magazine *** Unlike some copies, counters are centered. Player aids are stored in plastic protectors. Box and all components are like new.

Brand new in the factory shrink wrap. However there is some edge wear and dent to the box. See pictures. Price does not include shipping. Will be shipped from the USA, zip code 11365. Email for shipping quotes
Just out of shrink. Never played. Excellent condition. Counters unpunched. (because of weight S/H has an added value of 15 EUR to all options)

This copy is 100% unpunched and complete. The rule books have seen some usage. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve compiled the following list of imperfections. Rules of play manual has the following problems: Some wrinkling, mostly on the cover. Page 3 has _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mark_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; written in small ink on top edge. There is a small brown stain on the back cover, doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t touch any print. Small 3/4 inch separation on the bottom of the cover spine. The first column below indicates the page number the 2nd column indicates the number of lines that are highlighted on that page. Page Number Lines with yellow highlighting ----------- ------------------------------ 8 5 10 4 12 3 14 2 15 2 16 2 20 3 =============================== Grand Tactical Series Rules Summary booklet has the name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mark_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; printed on top edge of page 1. Some light scribbling or markings on the back cover. Small amount and doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t touch any print. ================================= Exclusive Rules and Scenarios book has wrinkling on the cover. Name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mark_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; written on top edge of page 3 ====================================================== Historical Booklet has the name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;mark_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; written along top edge of front cover. Some rubbing and discoloration on back cover. ====================================================== All of the other game components are in excellent, crisp clean condition. The box is not torn, but the box cover has some creases and edge wear on one corner. Send email for shipping quote. Will be mailed from zip code 11365 in the USA. Price does not include shipping cost.
Opened, but unpunched, unplayed. Includes replacement counters from Operations. Shipping extra - expect it to be high due to weight/size. US - c/mo/paypal International - paypal
Excellent condition. Only Shrink removed.

Game pieces and maps in mint, unpunched and unplayed condition. Rules have been read through a couple times. Includes unpunched errata counters from Operations SE#1. Box has corner damage from original shipment, and other minor corner damage from shelfwear (see images). Otherwise, great condition.
Still in shrink. Top box lid is depressed a little.

The game is in excellent condition. The counters for the first scenarios have been punched out and sorted into plastic counter trays. The corners of the punched counters have been clipped. If you like to have pictures of the game components, provide your e-mail address. I accept European Bank Transfer, please ask for shipping costs before placing an order.

This copy is 100% unpunched and complete except for the dice. All game components are in excellent and fresh condition. The box and lid each have a split corner which have been reinforced with clear tape. Minor shelf wear is also evident. Price does not include postage. Email for shipping quote from zip code 11365 in the USA. Photos available on request.

Sorry to say, with my current group, this game will never hit the table. I checked it out, love the components and maps, but with no chance of playing, its should go to someone who might actually get a play or two out of it. The game was being prepped for play, and while the counters are unpunched, in prep for play they have been clear coat for addional protection. The box also has a small bow in the bottom from sitting on the shelf. It sat flat so I am not sure how the bow happened. Smoke free environment. Feel free to geekmail me with any questions.

Complete and unpunched! NOTE: The playing aid has been laminated and the rules-books (except for the historical background-book) have been bound for better protection. One of the smaller maps has been slightly damaged at one edge by the other components, but the damage is only at the side of the map, not on the playing area.
Open to offers for this excellent Monster Game! Played 3 scenarious. Cunters punched and bagged. Excellent condition. Nothing missing. Maps pristine. Its too big for me!

One scenario was lightly played, and so some counters have been punched, though most countersheets are still intact. The game is in excellent condition. The extra counters from Operations magazine are included. I also added one counter tray to the box. I will only charge exact shipping costs, though delivery confirmation must be included. Keep in mind that this is a large box.

Shrinkwrap was removed, but game is unpunched. There is a small dent in the box, but the game components are in excellent shape. I will ship anywhere in the world and never ask more then actual shipping costs. Shipping of multiple items can be combined. Payment through PayPal (worldwide) or bank transfer (within EU). Any questions? Just ask!
less than 5% of the counters have been punched. Most components are like new, but the rulebooks have been thumbed thru alot and are slightly worn.
It is in shrink with some dents on the box. Make me an offer!
Updated with 15 replacement counters from Operations Special Issue #1. Punched. Counters tastefully clipped. Only played small scenario once.
shrinkwrapped

Still in original MMP shipping box. Other than shrink-wrap being removed, in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;as-new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition. Photos here: http://s3.photobucket.com/albums/y84/Nadir_E/Devils%20Cauldron%20Photos/
Still in shrinkwrap. Sold to Europe only, bank transfer or Paypal @ + 4%
100% brand new, never open, still in wrap.

Item is in shrink. Note shrink does have 1 tear in the upper right side and the box cover is slightly concave (I think from the shrink and it will bounce back once opened). INternational buyers welcome. Shipping will be at cost. USA shipping $15. Quotes available elsewhere

UNPUNCHED, Like New condition, double boxed for your protection, and will be sent with insurance. U.S. addresses only! This is my last copy! Prefer check or money order, but will try PayPal if you need to use it. $325 plus $25 shipping/insurance.
Game mostly unpunched. Some damage in one of the corners box due to transport.
Never opened.
Counters neatly clipped. Ships via Fedex with insurance for $25.

Unpunched. Rules and booklets have been read through and have some handling wear. Three of the box lid corners and two of the box back corners have minor creases otherwise the box is also in good condition. Please ask for pictures. Delivery of your choice and will be packed well. All forms of payment considered.
Unpunched and complete. Contents like new. Box has one crease along the top of the box lid. Delivery worldwide and will be packed well. All forms of payment considered.

Sold to cmalsam Brand new. Unpunched and unplayed. Only broke the shrinkwrap when I received it to make sure everything was present and in perfect condition. Beautiful looking game, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m never going to play it and I couldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t justify holding onto it when so many people are trying to find a copy. Please contact me with any questions or if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like pictures. I realize that I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t sold on BGG before, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been trading here and selling on ebay and rec.games.board for many years.
Not in Shrink. Unpunched and unplayed
Removed shrink to verify everything is present. Other that it is unpunched and in perfect condition. Also includes errata counters!

Punched not clipped. Counters stored in 6 trays which will be included. All components verified and accounted for and appear to be in excellent condition. HOWEVER I HAVE NOT VERIFIED THE NUMBER OF COUNTERS but have no reason to believe they are not all there. Corner rubs and edge wear but structurally very sound with no corner breaks. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship for multiple buys.

This is the ziplock copy, it do not comes with a box, but beside that, everything is in new mint, unplayed, unpunched condition. Buyer pays actual shipping plus a few dimes and nickles to cover gas and time, I usually round the amount up to the nearest dollar for that. Since this does it comes with a box, it will be easier to ship and the cost will be lower, but still it is a big and heavy game. I can give accurate quotes to foreign buyers if interested.
Excellent condition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; punched. Counters neatly trimmed (not clipped). Three GMT countertrays included.
I punched and perfectly trimmed the counters, the game is in perfect conditions. Shipping is 12 euros to Italy, 25 to Europe. Insured shipping is more expensive. Thanks for looking.
Punched, sorted and placed in expensive storage trays and unplayed. Game is complete. See actual pictures. Buyer to choose carrier. International buyers to pay all international fees.

RESERVED FOR EDMUD Unpunched. Its a beauty and it shows. Contents in like new condition. Counters and rule books in 8 x 11 baggies and everything internal covered in bubble wrap. No box damage noted. Yes I have Where Eagles Dare and yes you can have the pair for $500. Your Christmas present is here and ready for you. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship on multiple purchases.
Punched, beautiful trimmed counters, never played, with many counter trays

Shrinkwrapped copy. Pristine and mint. No holes in the shrink and no box damage. This is the one you want and it is a beauty. Also have Where Eagles Dare in shrinkwrap. Both mint. Grab them both for $575. You know you want to set this up. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship on multiple purchases.

For Sale both games: The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron and Where Eagles Dare. Upunched. Errata counters for WED from Ops Mag included. Extra charts and play aids included. Will include counter trays for both games. Boxes in good condition, TDC has a split up one corner which has been taped. Components in excellent condition. TDC rulebook has been read. Will post to UK, EUROPE, USA _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; CANADA but only by a signed for service with insurance which WILL BE VERY EXPENSIVE outside UK. Postage within UK by a signed for service with insurance to cover cost which will be more than normal given the weight of both games. Please ask for a shipping quote before buying as it saves having to cancel the sale if shipping cost is too much. Paypal only
Unpunched, like new.
In perfect status, unpunched and with replacements counters included. PayPal preferred. Photos and more info if interested.
Complete and Unpunched. Box has shelf wear and is the top and bottom are warped from being stacked with boxes of different sizes. Pictures can be sent on request
Unplayed, partially punched. Please contact for shipping costs.
Airmail rates are quite costly to US or UK so I would recommend sea mail (around $60.00). Please contact me with any questions. The game has only been played once and most counters are unpunched.

Unpunched. Contents verified complete and in like new condition. No dog ears, no creases, no folds. The box is crisp and clean. Square and straight with no dings or doinks. One very small corner crease on the back of the box. Some minor box bowing and barely neglible corner rubs. Add a shrinkwrap copy of Where Eagles Dare for an extra $125. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.

Game in very good condition. Slight bowing on box lid. Errata written (neatly) into books. Counters for introductory scenario punched and bagged. Genuine reason for selling, TCS not for me. If you want a copy of this to play rather than look at on the shelf then this is the copy for you! I have WED for sale due to the same reason in shrink wrap.

This listing is for a used copy of The Devil_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cauldron. The copy has been opened and counters punched. Included is a Plano container with all counters. The game is un-played, but I did read the manual pretty thoroughly (it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s got some light wear) and, as mentioned, the counters have been punched. Otherwise the components are in perfect condition. RESERVED FOR LONGLIVEOPUS
In shrink wrap, mint. Shipping insurance will be required.

Shrinkwrap copy. No holes in the shrink. No box damage. This one will be double boxed for protection. Its a beauty and its in mint condition. You know you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t wait to set it up. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.
Boxtop is a little bumped.
WARNING !!! THE GAME IS ON SALE ONLY WITH: WHERE EAGLES DARE (90 euro) Played, punched _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; clipped TWO SET OF MAPS ! ERRATA COUNTERS INCLUDED
New and in shrinkwrap.

The counters have been punched but not clipped. All components in very good condition indeed. The counters show no signs of handling/wear. The mapsheets are excellent, as are the player-aid cards. The Exclusive rules and Game rules booklets are in very good shape, though they have been neatly annotated (a very small amount) in places and there is a very small tear at the top of the spine on the Exclusive Rules/Scenario booklet. The Historical booklet is in great shape with no annotations. I have personally matched every counter against a unpunched set of countersheets and they are all there. Please contact me for shipping costs, especially if you live outside the UK. I pack very safely/securely.

All components are present and in like new shape. There is minimal damage to the box (I will send pictures on demand). Shipping to US is 50 USD (priority- delivery in 7 working days). On demand I can ship with economy for 30 USD, but it will take about 2 months, so be warned :) Tracking number is available for both shipping options. It also includes all errata counters from Where Eagles Dare! I can offer you also a copy of Where Eagles Dare, unpunched, if you were into a Monster Game Experience :) Please just ask for this possiblity
New and in shrink. Will ship internationally. Shipping costs will include insurance, and shipping will be via USPS.

Counters have been punched but otherwise excellent condition, unplayed. Checked all counters present vs scans, and errata counters also included. Maps as new, all charts etc fine. Box is slightly dented. I am travelling to the US in April so could bring over to save shipping costs.
Unpunched, unplayed. All components in excellent condition. Please contact me for shipping costs, especially if you live outside the UK. I pack securely/safely.
punched, excellent

Unpunched. Contents verified complete and in like new condition. The holy grail in all of its splendor. Clear out the basement and combine it with Where Eagles Dare. Your wife will only shake her head. Box is square and straight with no dings or doinks. Some bubbling on a couple of the lid corners but nothing serious. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.
